name: TargetBall
description:
control the blue ball moving through the dots.at each bright point,the movegoes AI(opponents).you can't walk the same path twice.score no less points than indicated in the upper right corner and reach the right pyramid with the ball.there will be bonuses at the levels,they bring extra points.Bonus T-teleports you to the pyramid.

I recommend to playing against a real opponent on the same computer.button PLAYER vs PLAYER will start the level.one controls the red ball,the  other blue,alternately trying to reach the opponents pyramid.
